patthana2.12:117.1: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:118.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.

patthana2.12:120.4: nokilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.12:136.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:137.1: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:138.1: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:138.4: lobho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ).
patthana2.12:138.6: lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:144.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

patthana2.12:158.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.12:160.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nasampayutte dve, navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:162.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.12:166.1: Saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā lokiyadukaṃ, evaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)

patthana2.12:173.2: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1

patthana2.12:175.2: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana2.12:176.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1

patthana2.12:180.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre pañca (saṃkhittaṃ), avigate pañca.

patthana2.12:184.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1

patthana2.12:199.2: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1

patthana2.12:209.6: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā asaṃkiliṭṭhā khandhā. #1
patthana2.12:210.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—

patthana2.12:211.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1

patthana2.12:234.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.12:235.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana2.12:236.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.12:237.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:237.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:239.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:239.2: rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.12:240.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:240.2: ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.12:240.6: saṃkiliṭṭhe khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena saṃkiliṭṭhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti;
patthana2.12:240.9: saṃkiliṭṭhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana2.12:314.1: (Evaṃ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi kilesadukasadisā. Ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Āmasanaṃ nānaṃ.)

patthana2.12:324.1: Kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.12:327.1: Kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.12:328.5: āvajjanā saṃkilesikānañceva no ca kilesānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:347.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), kamme nava, āhāre nava … pe … avigate nava.

patthana2.12:352.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.12:352.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.12:353.1: Kilesañceva saṃkiliṭṭhañca saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.12:353.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca uddhaccañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.12:356.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.12:358.1: (Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā.)
patthana2.12:363.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:363.2: kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ kilesānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.12:364.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:364.2: kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:365.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:365.2: kilesā ceva saṃkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesānañca hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.12:367.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:367.4: Kilese ārabbha saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:367.6: Kilese ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.12:368.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:368.2: saṃkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:368.4: Saṃkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:368.6: Saṃkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.12:371.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:372.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:372.4: saṃkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe garuṃ katvā … pe … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:372.7: (Dve adhipati tīṇipi kātabbā, itare dvepi tīṇi kātabbā.)
patthana2.12:374.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi kātabbā, āvajjanāpi vuṭṭhānampi natthi) … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … nava …pañhā (purejātapaccayo pacchājātapaccayopi natthi) … āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:376.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:376.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.12:377.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:377.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ kilesānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.12:378.1: Saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca saṃkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.12:378.2: saṃkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesānañca kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.12:379.1: Āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … nava …… sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … nava …… atthipaccayena paccayo … nava …… natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.12:382.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.12:384.1: Kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:388.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.12:390.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi … pe … namagge tīṇi … pe … navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.12:392.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.12:396.1: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.12:396.2: lobhaṃ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
patthana2.12:400.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.12:400.2: kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….
